Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and draw two different habitats, such as a land habitat and a water habitat.
The student can illustrate various plants and animals in each habitat, using examples like trees, bushes, lizards, and fish.
The student can show the diversity of living things within each habitat by including multiple types of plants and animals.
The student can compare the living things between both habitats, showing how they differ.
The student can organize their drawings to clearly represent patterns of plant and animal diversity across the two habitats.
